name: The Journey Of Little Kitty Lite
name_original: The Journey Of Little Kitty Lite
description:
Fantabulous 3D running game with Kitty Match Rival!
Unlock new characters and let them run in Kitty’s World!!!!
Run as fast as you can while jumping and rolling with simple control. Rush to increase your scores and do not forget to collect your coins.
##GAME FEATURES##
- Run fast through 3D world with impressive characters.
- Enjoy your ride with more than 50 levels.
- Dodge rocks, trees, blocks and slope curve land.
- Equip more than 10 power-ups and gadgets such as flying boot, invisible potion, magnet etc.
- Fascinating HD graphics.
- Collect items to discover new FEVER and explore the WORLD of GALAXY STAR!!!
- Unlock all characters.
- Challenge yourself and beat your High Score.
In Free Version Game Start with 500 Coins.
